display_long_description:
【Summary】
Magic Stone Guardians is a tower defense game that can be played in VR.
You play as a guardian deity protecting an underground temple and fight off enemies who try to steal the crystal.

Since the player is a spirit, he cannot attack the enemies directly.
Instead, they can summon Guardians by combining Magic Stones.

The combinations of strategies are endless with the combination and position of the Guardians to be summoned.
Use your own unique and powerful strategy to attack your enemies!


【Game Flow】
The game progresses in waves. When all enemies in a wave are defeated, the next wave begins.

The game incorporates a rogue light system.
If a crystal is destroyed, the game is over and progress is reset.

A boss wave will appear after every few normal waves.
Upon clearing the boss wave, players can choose one of the following rewards.
・ Unlock a usable cube.
・ Change the rate at which cubes are generated.
・ Raise the Guardian's level
・ build a cube generation platform.

【How to battle】
1. Grab the Magic Stone
You can grab it by holding the pointer from your hand over the magic stone and pressing the trigger button.

2. Place the Magic Stone on the floor.
If you release the button while holding the magic stone, you can place it on the floor.

3. By placing white and other colored Magic Stones next to each other, you can summon a Guardian for that combination!
